summary: Defines the Tab and Tabs controls used to build tabbed interfaces in the Flet UI framework. A Tab represents an individual tab header with optional text, icon, height and associated content, while Tabs manages a collection of Tab headers, handling selection, animation, layout, and visual styling such as colors, borders, padding, and alignment.
business_intent: Provide developers with a ready‑to‑use, highly customizable tab navigation component that simplifies switching between different sections of an application’s UI, improving user experience and reducing the need for custom implementation.
